metadata.title: CVE-2022-46391 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
AWStats 7.x through 7.8 allows XSS in the hostinfo plugin due to printing a response from Net::XWhois without proper checks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-46391` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

awstats - 7.8-2ubuntu0.22.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: awstats package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.8-2ubuntu0.22.10.1').
